actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard in operating to cause the vessel Widow Maker to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause a certain vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard in operating to cause the vessel Widow Maker to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
